name: BOXVR
detailed_description:
BOXVR brings high intensity, boxing inspired workouts to virtual reality.

Features:
  • WORKOUT – Our team of leading fitness instructors produce a variety of regularly updated boxing workouts, specifically designed to destroy calories.
  • TRAIN – Upload your own music and get a tailored boxing workout generated instantly
  • SURVIVE – What happens when you combine our effective workouts with an endless runner? Our toughest mode yet – who can last the longest?

Don’t just take our word for it:
  • "My partner and I have each lost 10+ pounds using this game. Highly recommended" - Greyman
  • "This is the best workout game" - Penetreitor
  • "I have Audioshield, Soundboxing, so I was hesitant to purchase this title at first...boy, was I wrong about this game...Now, this is my daily routine" - Bald Bull
  • "Writing this as my currently trying to dry from sweating so much. VR and games like this are exactly what I need to exercise" - Snooch
  • "This is the workout game I've been looking for! I have tried most of them, and BOXVR is the first game that really brings all the different gameplay types together for a full-body workout" - Knifie_Sp00nie
  • "If you watch the trailer, and think that would be fun to do a quick session each night. Then buy now! This is even the first VR experience my wife comes back to play!" - Chicken$#it

Proudly brought to you by the team at FITXR


Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR

short_description:
Rhythm-Based Boxing Inspired Workouts.
The only VR workout app with regularly updated workouts by professional fitness instructors.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
reviews:
“Best VR Fitness Game of the Year”
VR Fitness Insider

“A game for everyone that wants to get ripped”
Discovery Channel

“A cross between Guitar Hero and Moov's boxing workouts”
Wareable

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

package_groups.name: subscriptions
package_groups.title: Buy BOXVR Subscription Plan
package_groups.description: To be billed on a recurring basis.

subs.option_description: 22,99€ at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at 22,99€.
